Razor Claw knew that there was only one way to survive a blast from a weapo=
n of that size. he transformed to Raptor mode and used full strength on his=
 shield. The ground around him incinerated on contact. He survived but it w=
as sapping to much of his strength. The raptor couldn't move without deacti=
vating his shield.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: SOULSTICE 
  To:=
 nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, December 22, 2000 10:04 AM
  Subject: =
Re: Sorry soulstice


  Mobster took a scratch of damage, still looking dow=
n at Razorclaw. Mobster aimed his giant cannon at Razorclaw and fired...
  =
  ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: CYBERWOLF4 
    To: nbwrpg@egroup=
s.com 
    Sent: Friday, December 22, 2000 7:01 AM
    Subject: Re: Sorry s=
oulstice


    Razor Claw stood confused for the moment, he tried to show n=
o weakness. He stepped forward and hurled his sword at Mobster. "Is this su=
pposed to impress me?" he asked looking up at the bot he challenged. 
     =
 ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: SOULSTICE 
      To: nbwrpg@egro=
ups.com 
      Sent: Thursday, December 21, 2000 10:50 AM
      Subject: Re=
: Sorry soulstice


      Gigas didn't move an inch, seeing as how Mobster =
was in his place now.

      Gigas: How about this, I crush you, as Mobster=
, I crush you, as Gigas, it'll work 2 ways.

      Mobster switches voices.=


      Kracken: But right now, we're Mobster...
        ----- Original Mes=
sage ----- 
        From: CYBERWOLF4 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
     =
   Sent: Thursday, December 21, 2000 10:15 AM
        Subject: Re: Sorry so=
ulstice


        Razor Claw looked up at his attacker still showing no fea=
r, "That sounds like a challenge, Let's make this interesting, you knock me=
 down, I join your alliance, I knock you down, you surrender to the Maximal=
s, deal?" he stepped forward, pulled his left arm back and threw an upprcut=
 into Gigas' stomach. "I'll go first."
          ----- Original Message ---=
-- 
          From: SOULSTICE 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          =
Sent: Wednesday, December 20, 2000 12:18 PM
          Subject: Re: Sorry so=
ulstice


          Gigas: Oh, hohohohoho, I love an unfair fight. That was=
n't my best shot, but I didn't want to waste anything on you. In other word=
s, I am not intimidated. I have seen battles come and go, me taking the bru=
nt of the attack, but i still stand, I still walk, I still fight. You know,=
 you should join the Alliance, it would do you a world of good.

          =
Gigas stayed planted to his spot, not moving an inch...
            ----- O=
riginal Message ----- 
            From: CYBERWOLF4 
            To: nbwrpg=
@egroups.com 
            Sent: Wednesday, December 20, 2000 10:20 AM
     =
       Subject: Sorry soulstice


            Sorry, it must've been mixxed=
 up in the battle. I found it.

            claw struck him, but Gigas didn=
't move. Beholder 2 and Grenade are both bowled over by the energy ball. Ho=
rn Drill jumps in the air and backflips, happy that he again came through f=
or the Mini-Mafia. Gigas looks down at Razorclaw. (Judging by the size of t=
he Razorclaw figure and the fact that Gigas is a large, Ultra sized bot, li=
ke Depth Charge) Gigas swings a huge punch at Razorclaw

            Razor =
Claws head snapped back from Gigas' punch.  The punch hurt like hell but Ra=
zor Claw wouldn't show pain. The impact caused the Raptor to be knocked bac=
k about ten feet but he stayed on his feat. He looked back  at the attacker=
 and couldn't hold back a snarl. "I hope that wasn't your best shot, I'd ha=
te to have to eliminate you in an unfair fight".
              ----- Origin=
al Message ----- 
              From: THECODE 
              To: nbwrpg@egr=
oups.com 
              Sent: Tuesday, December 19, 2000 6:13 PM
          =
    Subject: Re: three on one hardly seems fair, maybe the three should get=
 help.


              OOC: Hey, Gigas punched at Razorclaw, post damage...=

                ----- Original Message ----- 
                From: CYBERW=
OLF4 
                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                Sent: Tuesday=
, December 19, 2000 10:31 AM
                Subject: three on one hardly s=
eems fair, maybe the three should get help.


                Razor Claw sa=
w the three bots leaving the sceen of the battle and mistook them for escap=
ing alliance members. he mentally reported his actions to Ice and got the g=
o ahead. He chased the three until they were out of the way of the fight. H=
e transformed to robot mode, pulled his sword and confronted them. "You wil=
l stop or you will be forced to, your choice."

                He aproache=
d the three bots ready for battle and hoping that things won't be ended pea=
cefully.
                  ----- Original Message ----- 
                  =
From: dachande 
                  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                 =
 Sent: Monday, December 18, 2000 7:40 PM
                  Subject: Eclipse=
, Wolveritron, and Ramus


                  ::Eclipse/Wolveritron/Ramus::
=
                   
                      They had heard the battling and d=
ecided to run away, they needed no part in the conflict. Eclipse and Wolver=
itron ran into Ramus as they were leaving, and togther they exited the base=
, in beast modes. And headed far away.













        eGroups Sponsor=
